summary: At the late night jam sessions in LA, Jazz musicians used to dedicate their shows to the greatest alto sax player in the world, Frank Morgan, but if you wanted to hear him, you had to go to San Quentin. We went.
cast: Frank Morgan|Mark Gross|Ron Carter|Grace Kelly|Eric Gladstone|Gary Giddins|Geraldine Morgan|Michael Connelly|Florette Morgan|Delfeayo Marsalis|George Cables|Charlie Parker|Cecilia Tapscott|Steve Isoardi|Clora Bryant|Kirk Silsbee|Patricia Willard|David Brunk|Nevlyn Brunk|Marvin Smith|Freddy Martin|Gerald Wilson|Nat 'King' Cole|Ed Reed|Horace Tapscott|Billie Holiday|Frank Fontaine|Lynda Parks|Angela Morgan Walker|Melanie Taylor|Reggie Marshall|Rosalinda Kolb|Denise Flemming|Ken Greengrass|Patrick Downey|Cathy Diane Tomlin|Luke Peckinpah|Doug Cavanough|Don Moss|Connie Mellors|Garrett Marchbank|Anwar Mitchell
title: Sound of Redemption: The Frank Morgan Story
